title: Student Dark Skin Tone
description: Represents a student with a dark skin tone, often used in contexts related to education, learning, graduation, or academic pursuits.
apple_vendor_description: The student emoji with dark skin tone, as seen on Apple devices, presents a thoughtful and eager individual, often depicted with books or a backpack, symbolizing learning and education. Apple's design language gives this emoji a friendly, approachable look with subtle highlights and soft rounded edges, emphasizing a positive attitude towards knowledge. It's frequently used to represent school, studying, or academic pursuits.
